raw_comment: We say, your sightings depend on the amount of people in an area.  It seems that spring comes earlier in the southern area like January and comes later in the mountainous areas like May. We never know how or when our spring is gonna come because of how many strange conditions we have in April
ace_sentences: We say that your sightings depend on the number of people in an area.
Spring seems to come earlier in a southern area.
In a southern area, spring seems to come in January.
Spring seems to come later in mountainous areas.
In mountainous areas, spring seems to come in May.
We do not know how spring will come.
We do not know when spring will come.
We have many strange conditions in April.
